I stand before you to give you the talk of disclosure and openness, I am the citizen Mohammed Morsi responsible for the fate of the nation and the future of the people of the # president
I wish that the situation would be as we would all like, but Egypt faces many challenges
I worked with the faithful in this country in the estimation of things and sometimes caused and sometimes made mistakes, and the error is contained but corrected by duty # President
Avoid exceptional measures as much as possible but after a year we need radical reforms # President
Practice has shown that the achievement of the objectives of the January Revolution must have radical reforms in the structures of the state # President
Some people are imagining that there is a possibility to turn back the clock and return to corruption, oppression and injustice
Some opposition factions rejected the outstretched hand to participate in the government, some of them allied with the enemies of the revolution, abandoning the rules of democracy
We are under constitutional legitimacy to hold the president accountable before the subordinate .. And the revolution does not give an open mandate to one of the president
You face a war of failure as you can see, and it is time to perform a precise surgery to eradicate the enemies of bull # President
